Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

programme.desc: John Rambo's peaceful life is interrupted when Gabriela, his friend's granddaughter, disappears in Mexico. He decided to free her from the clutches of local cartels, starting a cycle of revenge

programme.title: Money
programme.desc: Get caught up in the tale of a new stock broker who dreams of becoming rich. Those dreams make him susceptible to a stock market scam that threatens to get him in trouble.

programme.title: Steel Rain 2: Summit
programme.desc: A general holds the U.S. president and the leaders of North Korea and South Korea hostage on a submarine.

programme.title: All The Money In The World

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Park Young-bae must find his best friend, Dong-sik, who stole the $300,000 sports car to pay off debts, before the boss and his gang decides Young-bae is better off dead.

programme.title: The Bachelors
programme.desc: After his wife's early death, a mourning father moves with his teenage son across the country for a private-school teaching job. Their lives begin to transform thanks to two unique women who help them embrace life and love again.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: Two hitmen band together to find a rouge assassin for whom there is a large bounty placed

programme.title: Project A

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: It takes patience and commitment for The Rhino Orphanage, as they nurture young rhinos whose mothers have been lost to poaching.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup and the gang struggle to uphold the traditions that keep the peace between Berk and the Beserkers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When a Yeti is spotted in Nepal, chasing away all the locals, the Wanderers investigate only to find out it’s another Odlulu plot. They must work with Wizard Rockybeard to stop Yeti-Fritz get the Furball Key back

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: King Julien is mistakenly diagnosed with Mad Horse Disease, leading him to believe he's going to die – and Uncle King Julien to try to reclaim the throne.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
programme.desc: Voltron charges toward Zarkon's massive ship. When Shiro loses control of the Black Lion, the team must figure out a new way to defeat the Galra.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag becomes jealous when Yip prefers to spend time with puppy-sitter Beans instead of with her. Determined to win Yip back, Tag enlists the help of Cheddar Biscuit, Gilber, Spike and Frank to try and win him back. / Frank and Beans find out that Tag and Scooch are trying to get into the Doggy Book of World Records and sabotage every attempt. When Tag and Scooch find out what the sneaky duo are up to, they come up with a plan to outsmart them.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protégé./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Jim and Kate are getting married... or are they?

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: The townspeople are so terrified when Puss brings the skeleton army back to San Lorenzo that they ignore Uli's sad attempts at being evil and scary.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Puss discovers the coveted Crown of Souls gemstone was split into three pieces for three witch sisters, he finds Malviola and asks for her stone

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold — along with Principal Krupp — blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who’s been hired to wreck Boss and Tina’s lives. Crispin puts the new company’s loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Our team’s startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a “Space Race”, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend “moon landing” for a baby – a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Cruel War
programme.desc: To combat the greenhouse effect, scientist Yan Xin attempts to plant newly developed super rubber seeds on a remote island, hoping to transform it into a thriving new land. Yan Xin's ex-husband decides to accompany her on this perilous journey. As conflicts arise, they encounter the local drug cartel, and a fatal battle is about to begin.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: Love Punch
programme.desc: Talented boxer Jia Yang is caught in an underground fight to clear her father's debts. She loses her Olympic aspiration and vanishes from the boxing world. 10 years later, Coach Li Yue is determined to help her honour her father's wish by returning to the ring. As passion and obligation collide, can Jia Yang revive her abandoned boxing dream?

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: It's Beginning To Look A Lot Like Murder
programme.desc: Diana learns that she inherited a house from her aunt. Estate attorney Matt insists on sorting out the details over Christmas. During her stay, Diana finds clues that suggest her aunt was murdered.

programme.title: A Chef's Deadly Revenge
programme.desc: Lucy has just escaped an abusive relationship when she meets the kind Frank, but when she discovers that Frank is stalking her, she decides she's had enough of abusive men and turns the tables on Frank.

programme.title: Abducted At An HBCU: A Black Girl Missing Movie
programme.desc: When ambitious college student Shannon disappears due to financial struggles, her counselor Ellen discovers a trafficking ring targeting students like her and must fight to rescue Shannon.

programme.title: My Sister's Serial Killer Boyfriend
programme.desc: When her sister starts to fall for their self-defence instructor, reporter Maddie becomes suspicious and tries to intervene before the relationship turns into a deadly obsession.

programme.title: 24 Hour Flip (S1)
programme.desc: Jon and Michelle set their sights on a four-bedroom, one-and-a-half bath split level home in Union, New Jersey. With 24 hours on the clock, they remodel everything and add some special touches.

programme.title: 24 Hour Flip (S1)
programme.desc: Jon and Michelle leave the bustling city for the beautiful countryside, only to realise that their Dutch Colonial masterpiece needs more than a few brushstrokes to fix.

programme.title: 24 Hour Flip (S1)
programme.desc: Jon and Michelle tackle a sprawling, 2,500-square-foot house in Hopatcong, New Jersey, an idyllic, lakeside community. But more house means more problems.

programme.title: Because This Is My First Twenty
programme.desc: Will So Hyun get a chance to become a Hollywood actress 10 years after she launched her acting career?

programme.title: All Fixed Up In An Empty Village (S3)
programme.desc: After the intense battle for empty homes, special missions are assigned to the four. Enter Yoo Jung-soo, the “spatial planning master”, who reinterprets the village revival project.

programme.title: Road Trip Hostage
programme.desc: When pursuing her dreams leads to a fractured relationship with her mother, a young student leaves home, but soon finds herself the hostage of a criminal who forces her to drive him across the country.

programme.title: Hoax: The Kidnapping Of Sherri Papini
programme.desc: In 2016, Sherri Papini's disappearance captivated the nation, but her abduction story unraveled when it was revealed she was not a kidnap victim as she initially claimed.

programme.title: Ppang Car Road 2
programme.desc: From Seoul to Busan, this spectacular eating show takes place at famous bakeries/patisseries to give the dessert lovers the glimpse of tasty goodness of some of the most-coveted desserts of all.

programme.title: Jason's Table: Masterful Dishes
programme.desc: Braised pork knuckle is an auspicious dish served in weddings, birthday dinners, and Lunar New Years. Chef Garrison Cheng, makes a twist on classic pork knuckle by using braising and frying techniques.

programme.title: Jason's Table: Masterful Dishes
programme.desc: Five Willow Fish is a Taiwanese dish that makes great use of the nation’s affluent fishery. Chef Long interprets this dish with masterful skills, and Jason creates a dish inspired by Five Willow Fish.

programme.title: Jason's Table: Masterful Dishes
programme.desc: Pantoh is a Taiwanese dining experience where guests enjoy exquisite dishes in open-air venues. Chef Ah-yong showcases an emblematic dish of pantoh cuisine: calamari, sea snail, and leek soup.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Three contestants face a pressure test set by Michelin-starred chef Michael Wilson. The contestants must recreate Michael's incredible Marguerite Opera dessert, nicknamed The Tower of Terrorí.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Today, the contestants have another chance at grabbing immunity. In a lucky dip, they must pick a letter of the alphabet to reveal a corresponding ingredient they must cook with.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Itís a time split! The contestants have 90 minutes to use across two rounds. Those who end up in Round 2 will need to use their time more cleverly than ever before to stay in the competition.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Judge Andy Allen has picked the ingredients for today's Everything Mystery Box, and with just six contestants remaining he wants to challenge them with some unusual flavours to be combined into one dish.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Today the winners from yesterday's Everything Mystery Box battle it out in an elite Vue de monde, service challenge, with chef Hugh Allen running their service.

programme.title: Maid For Revenge
programme.desc: A maid wakes up covered in blood beside her client's pool, with the owner dead in the water, her young son's son's life in jeopardy - and no memory of what has occurred.

programme.title: Kirk Franklin's The Night Before Christmas
programme.desc: Caught in a blizzard on Christmas Eve, an estranged mother and daughter learn valuable life lessons when they take refuge inside a church alongside other parishioners.

programme.title: CSI S5 E17 - Compulsion
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: CSI S5 E18 - Spark of Life
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: Pickle teams up with Jacob, and it's almost like being on vacation. Zak tries to make up for a crucial mistake. Bruce ventures into uncharted territory. Ashley sets her sights on monstrous land gators.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: The team continues to chase a tunnel that may run directly below the Garden Shaft and into the Baby Blob, where tests revealed high traces of silver and gold.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: Racing an incoming hurricane, Darrell Miklos and his team are forced to make tough choices. But after a season-long search, they locate the source of the massive magnetometer hit recorded at Target 4.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: When an indigenous sound ritual is performed on Skinwalker Ranch, the team is amazed by the phenomena that are revealed.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: The big guns come out in Riverside, but Rene isn't having any of it. Darrell presses his luck with a smaller locker and makes a neat profit. Dusty finds that once he gets going, it's hard to stop...

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: Lisa has her own take on beach day, as she heads to Huntington Beach. Darrell spends the right amount of time going through his locker. Kenny rides a recent string of luck right into his unit.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos looks at mysterious teachers who have appeared throughout history and reveals The Top Ten Alien Influencers, who he believes provide the ultimate proof of extraterrestrial contact.

programme.desc: For thousands of years, human ingenuity has shaped awe-inspiring structures. From a grand basilica in Vatican City to a lost city in the clouds of Peru, we uncover the enduring mysteries they hold.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is full of deadly predators, and some of them attack in extraordinary and inexplicable ways. Do some animals strike back at humans for reasons beyond normal defence and hunger?

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S2)
programme.desc: For millennia, plagues, curses, and the violent destruction of cities have been blamed on the wrath of gods. But were these divine punishments mere myth, or is there proof they are based on real events?

programme.title: The Death Coast
programme.desc: After finding an American coin at Le Chameau's wreck site, Jeff MacKinnon must choose to either—stay the course or chase a new mystery.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: As the survivalists struggle to find their footing, signs of winter's onslaught motivates them to put their plans into action. Some claim their first victories, while one participant grapples an issue.

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: An exploration into the dark art of spycraft. From the frankenkitty to the umbrella gun, we'll reveal the deadliest spy weapons deployed to gather information and assassinate enemies.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 23
programme.desc: When NASA reschedules Howard's mission and puts his wedding plans in jeopardy, he's forced to face his fears and Bernadette's dad (guest star CASEY SANDER).

programme.desc: Ross worries when his student/girlfriend goes on vacation with her wild friends. Rachel needs a date for a ball. Joey's refrigerator breaks down.

programme.desc: Audrey and Mary go to war over CeeCee and Georgie, and Mandy can’t help but take sides.

programme.desc: Audrey’s past rears its head when Georgie leaves the store to work for Fred Fagenbacher (Matt Letscher), Jim’s longtime nemesis, and Mandy struggles to keep peace in the house.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 12
programme.desc: Georgie worries he’s letting his family down when he’s forced to stay home with a cold, and Mandy worries about how her career will affect her marriage.

programme.title: Full House S1 1
programme.desc: Three grown men experiencing the "joys of motherhood," as they raise three adorable girls in a Full House.

programme.title: Full House S1 2
programme.desc: The girls are rockin' when Uncle Jesse is left in charge of them for the night, but Danny is reeling when he arrives home to find Jesse conducting band practice.

programme.title: Full House S1 3
programme.desc: Stephanie's reluctance to attend her first day of school disappears when Joey and Jesse visit her kindergarten class.

programme.title: Full House S1 4

programme.title: Full House S1 5
programme.desc: When Danny hears Michelle call Jesse and Joey "Dada" he knows that he isn't spending enough time with his daughters and creates a father/daughter day.

programme.title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
programme.desc: Max tracks his stolen belongings to a strange city called Bartertown, ruled with an iron fist by Aunty Entity, who is locked in a power struggle with her rival Master Blaster.

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: Smallville S1 21
programme.desc: As a massive tornado approaches the unsuspecting Smallville, Clark finds a missing piece of the spaceship that carried him to Earth.

programme.title: Justice League (2017)
programme.desc: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of metahumans to stand against this newly awakened threat. But despite the formation of this unprecedented league of heroes – Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash – it may already be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: Firefighter Gordon Brewer, is done putting out fires and ready to start one of his own. When his wife and child are horrifically killed in an international terrorist bombing -- linked to Claudio "The Wolf" Perrini -- the CIA and FBI offer no answers and no response. With the official investigation going nowhere, and haunted by the thought of his family's killer walking away scot-free, Gordon swears revenge, even if it takes him to Colombia.

programme.title: East Of Eden
programme.desc: Hollywood legend James Dean stars in this adaptation of John Steinbeck's classic novel East of Eden. Teenaged Cal Trask (Dean--Rebel Without a Cause, Giant) longs for the affection that his father reserves for his brother Aron, but his efforts meet only rejection. Also attracted to Aron's girlfriend, Cal becomes so frustrated in his search for love and acceptance that he reveals a long-held secret about their mother to Aron . . . knowledge that now tears the family apart.

programme.title: Er S1 3
programme.desc: Dr. Lewis is confronted by a private physician concerning her risky treatment of a heart patient. Carol returns to work at the ER. A mysterious woman wanders the halls of the hospital.

programme.title: Er S1 4
programme.desc: Carter contacts the wrong parents to inform them that their son is dead. Ross is still attracted to Hathaway--who just moved in with Dr. John Taglieri.

programme.title: French Connections
programme.desc: French Connections revolves around France, its top stories and news, its experience in various spheres and cultural life, sport events, health care and education, cuisine and so much more. Find out what is like to live in France, get to know its regions, and feel the true taste of France.

programme.title: Fashion
programme.desc: Young creative minds and experienced gurus of fashion present their collections to the audience. Be aware of what is in the spotlight every season and find out the latest trends. Follow haute couture news, videos, reports and analyses, and look behind the scene of Parisian catwalks.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Watch the latest international top stories, The News every 30 minutes with the emphasis on debate, dialogue, role of cultural differences, analytics of key events all over the world, comments, hot topics of the day, reports.

programme.title: Tête à tête
programme.desc: An interview with a personality from the world of economics, politics, culture or diplomacy.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Watch the latest international top stories, The News every 30 minutes with the emphasis on debate, dialogue, role of cultural differences, analytics of key events all over the world, comments, hot topics of the day, reports.

programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Keep up with the latest news from all over the globe with Focus on France 24. Focus programme provides exclusive reports from Monday to Friday at 7.50 am Paris time. Find out what's going on in the world of economy, politics, culture, sport, medicine, ecology. Focus has it all covered for you. Short videos contain facts, interviews with real people, numbers, statistics, everything you need to be aware of recent events in the world and of what is actually going on.

programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body

programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: A brutal double murder shocks Northern California's peace-loving and laid-back Marin County. With residents reeling, police chase an elusive killer through three counties.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S5)
programme.desc: A violent argument between two men erupts at a busy grocery store. One is shot dead and the other faces a murder charge. With the whole incident caught on CCTV, who will the jury believe was the aggressor?

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 and her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert.After the discovery of a second victim, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: Tulsa detectives investigate how a young rapper was found shot dead on the street of an affluent suburban neighbourhood. The defence accuses the prosecution's key eyewitness of pulling the trigger.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Travel blogger Carla Stefaniak went to Costa Rica to celebrate her 36th birthday. But when she was to arrive back home to Miami, her awaiting loved ones realised she never got on the plane.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A father and daughter endure a terrifying road rage incident in North Carolina. Firefighters in Texas race to rescue a man who gets impaled by a steel fence pole.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S5)
programme.desc: A violent argument between two men erupts at a busy grocery store. One is shot dead and the other faces a murder charge. With the whole incident caught on CCTV, who will the jury believe was the aggressor?

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A man hurls furniture onto a busy NYC street from atop a skyscraper; a self-proclaimed bride is arrested for DUI on her supposed wedding day, and more!

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A suspected murderer is attacked in court by another suspected murderer; a desperate courtroom escape attempt; a violent convict assaults his lawyer; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: A fateful choice tragically ends the life of an up-and-coming rapper.

programme.desc: In Tulsa, a woman is brutally attacked as payback for someone else, then, a barber is gunned down by someone who greets him as a friend. And in Atlanta, a man sticks up for a friend and becomes the target.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: When Toni meets Harold at a medical convention, they click and soon marry. But when money starts going missing from Toni's account, suspicion falls on Harold.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When the battered body of Shawna Yandell, 16, is found floating in Washington State's Yakima River in 1993, detectives first suspect those closest to her.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: After Derrick Todd Lee was arrested, police were able to connect him to other cold cases. Baton Rouge had approximately 60 unsolved cases of missing or murdered women from the previous 10 years.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a loving wife and mother is found stabbed to death inside her home, a team of investigators dedicate eight years to finding her killer.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a 13-year-old girl goes missing and is found murdered, virtual evidence she leaves behind leads to two shocking arrests.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: In the shadow of the Rockies, Carolyn Jansen, 43, is found dead, stuffed into a duct-taped container. Detectives have two suspects but no clear way to tell who is the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: When a Christian ranch hand, Dan Lavigne, 52, is shot dead on his porch in Montana, 2002, deputies find no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A man charged with his fourth DUI rages against the machine, and a mom, who's a first-time arrestee, contemplates life as a possible convicted felon. In Modesto, a man is accused of felony arson.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: A historic Texan town is stunned when a popular caretaker is found dead and a beloved resident goes missing. But with support from a concerned community, detectives uncover the secrets that led to murder.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 12
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 10
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: For the Love ep 10
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Irene is torn between her selfish and immature husband and her considerate neighbour. She is forced to choose between the two when her son, tired of the constant fighting, runs away from home.

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 1
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari original series. Four beauty pageant contestants find themselves prime suspects when another contestant winds up dead. Each girl has her motive, but which one of them did it? And which one will end up with the crown?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 10
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 6

programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.desc: Irene is torn between her selfish and immature husband and her considerate neighbour. She is forced to choose between the two when her son, tired of the constant fighting, runs away from home.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 12
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
